name: Vestiges (Prune M)
description:
Let yourself be immersed in the world of Vestiges, a narrative and contemplative experience.
You play a young Waipoe (beings living underwater) and venture into the abyss, accompanied by your best friend Teano, to learn more about a long lost civilization: the Humans.

Made by first year game students. 

Game Designers / Programmers : Chaperon Lucas, Art Michel

Game Artists : Mathieu Heard, Diane Lemercier, Prune Martin

Under the supervision of : Antonin Congy, Chloe Ravallec
